content:
# The attempt to harvest coal was successful, and my inventory now contains 15 coal and 10 iron ore. This indicates that my player position has likely updated correctly after the movement and harvesting actions.

# Now that I have resources, I will try to place the stone furnace again, but first, I need to ensure that I am at a valid position close enough to the coal.

# I will move to a position that is guaranteed to be within the allowable range for placing the furnace.
move_to(Position(x=20, y=-14))  # Move to a position closer to the coal resource.
